bike.description: M5 manipulated alloy, 150mm rear spacing, compact race design, 1-1/2" forged HT, magnesium link, ISCG 05 mount, cartridge bearing rear shock mount, rear derailleur protector, 200mm travel

components.description: Cane Creek Double Barrel, coil over w/piggy back, high/low speed compression and high/low speed rebound adj., 9.5x3", XS: 300, S:350, M:400, L:450
Specialized 7050 hard anodized alloy, 34.9mm, single bolt
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
